The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_launch_fire: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_Des: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_Lor: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_Not: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of 1300 units.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_tog: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_D:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After %tooltip_duration% seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_a: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together. Does not refresh ultimate abilities.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_L: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_icarus_div: Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second and movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_fire_spiri: Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second and attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
Reflections can only attack their source.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_conjure: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_metamor: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within %metamorph_aura_tooltip% range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorblade_reflec: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and being attacked by Terrorblade's reflection.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorblade_metamo: Powerful demon form with a ranged attack.
Terrorblade's nearby illusions will match his current form.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fortunes_end: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to %max_channel_time_tooltip% seconds. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fates_edict_: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them %magic_damage_resistance_pct_tooltip%%% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.
An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_purifying_fl: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.
The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_fates_edict: Disarmed, magic damage resistance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%, all other incoming damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_false_promi: Any healing or damage taken is delayed until False Promise ends. Delayed healing will be doubled.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active %radius% AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for %proximity_threshold% seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals %building_damage_pct%%% damage to buildings.
Cannot be placed within active AoE of another Proximity Mine.
Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
Mines are triggered by invisible units.
Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.
Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Des: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Not: Dying from this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.
Techies still earn experience for suicide kills made with this ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_remote_mine: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_focused_det: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
Why light one fuse when you can light them all?
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_minefield_s: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts %lifetime% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_stasis_tra: You found one of the Techies' Stasis Traps!
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_land_mines: The number of Proximity Mines currently deployed.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_minefield_: Hidden by the Techies' Minefield Sign.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of %percent_damage%%% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her %night_vision_bonus% additional vision range at night while soaring.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.
Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining 40 mana per second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_splin: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a %split_radius% radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%%.
Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
The primary projectile moves at 500 movespeed, or reaches the target in 1 second, whichever is faster up to 4000 speed.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_cold_: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies.
The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_arct: Flying. Attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies while burning them for 8%% of their current health.
Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and losing 8%% of current health per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_cold: Immune to physical damage, and regenerating health.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_wint: Frozen in place, and will be attacked by nearby teammates.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Des: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Lor: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_magnetic: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_spark_wr: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_tempest_: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.
Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_flux_De: Taking damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% when not near a friendly unit.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_magneti: Gaining bonus %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and granting 100%% evasion from attacks outside the field.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_tempest: A complete clone of Arc Warden that can use spells and items with the exception of Gem of True Sight and Divine Rapier.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Right-click ground to drop from tree.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_primal_: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_boundle: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_jingu_m: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_mischie: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise. Grants invulnerability for %invul_duration% upon transforming.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_untrans: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.
Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_boundl: Stunned by Monkey King's Boundless Strike
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_unperc: Fell out of a tree; stunned
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after %initial_creation_delay% seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.
The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
Does not reveal rooted invisible enemies.
Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_shadow_: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after %max_damage_duration% seconds.
What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_cursed_: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_terrori: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bedlam_: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_shadow: Untargetable and gaining bonus magic damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_cursed: About to be stunned by Cursed Crown.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_debuff: Running to home base away from Dark Willow.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_bedlam: A wisp swirls around Dark Willow and attacks enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: Vector Targeted. Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.\n\nLucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Swashbuckle attacks.
Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_shield_cr: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.\n\nForward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_heartpier: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.
These fools know nothing of real armor...
Does not proc when attacking Roshan or buildings.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_lucky_sho: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to slow and apply either a Silence or a Disarm.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell:
Pangolier curls into a magic-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pangolier_gyroshel: Pangolier ricochets and briefly loses control of his movement.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_dark_art: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_dark_ar: This unit has slowed movement speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.\n\nHero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or magic immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.
Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_ink_cre: A phantom is silencing and damaging this unit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_spirit_w: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After %buff_duration% seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how how long ink tendril was near any hero.
Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_spirit_: This unit has increased movement speed and is silenced, disarmed, and immune to attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
Blinking or teleporting can break the ink bind.
Provides vision of both leashed units.

The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Enemies damaged by Scream of Pain are forced to run towards their fountain for 1.5 seconds.
After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals 25%% damage, takes 250%% damage, and lasts 10 seconds.
The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, 30 degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.
+15 Atrophy Attack Bonus Damage From Heroes
Any tree that is destroyed on the map will respawn 2 seconds later.
-0.1 Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.
Attacks Apply 40% MS and AS Slow
Applies a basic dispel on all enemies hit.
A second Wall of Replica is created 600 units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.
Magic Immunity for Chaotic Offering Golems
The wards are based on the current level of Plague Ward and spawned within 100 range of the impacted Hero, on opposite sides.
Two additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.
Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.
Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.
Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.
Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by 100%% for 1 second.
All enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.
Spawns 3 Ghostships, 2.8 seconds apart, towards the target location.
Releases 12 Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.
Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 90 second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within 160-200 range of each enemy hero.
Your own attacks against enemy units also have a chance to trigger Counter Helix.
When using Searing Arrows, a second Searing Arrow targets a random enemy within the spell's range.
The slow is still applied for the same duration.
Grants a %value%%% chance to avoid damage entirely.
+140 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed
500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
Every 500 distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.
Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.
Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.
Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.
The duration of the stun is not affected.
Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.
While Exorcism is active, Death Prophet moves at 550 movement speed and cannot be slowed.
Launches a two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.
No actions take Riki out of invisibility, only revealed by sources of True Sight.
Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.
The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).
Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by %value%%% and miss %value%%% of their attacks.
Soul Catcher Creates Illusion On Death
Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every %value% seconds.
While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.
While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.
Creates an additional ring of 7 soldiers at 1100 range from the center.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_spell_block_: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also reduces status effects by 25%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_bash_Descrip: Roshan has a chance to stun on attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_slam_Descrip: Roshan slams the ground, damaging and slowing all nearby enemies. Slam's damage will increase every minute.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_devotion_Des: Roshan possesses numerous protective abilities, including 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and a scaling armor bonus that increases as time goes on.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_spell_block: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_devotion_De: 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor. The armor bonus increases over time.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_taskmaster_s: The Kobold Foreman's cruel efficiency increases his movement speed and the movement speed of all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_endura: The fearsome Hellbear Smasher attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_war_st: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gnoll_assassin_enve: The Vhoul Assassin has soaked his weapons in his own blend of painful predator venoms. Heroes recover from the poison more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ghost_frost_attack_: The Ghost launches an eerie attack that chills her enemies to their bones.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_frost_attack: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_polar_furbolg_ursa_: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_polar_furbolg_ursa: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_neutral_spell_immun: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_neutral_spell_immu: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mudgolem_cloak_aura: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_frost_arm: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any melee enemies that dare attack it.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_frost_ar: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Enemy melee units that attack will suffer reduced movement and attack speed.
Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll_warlord_: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities. Interrupts channeling abilities.
The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life two skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf_critical: The Giant Wolf's ferocious attacks occasionally tear a vital tendon, inflicting critical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_critical: The cruel Alpha Wolf attacks his enemy's unprotected vitals at every opportunity, inflicting critical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_command_: The Alpha Wolf's ruthless attacks do extra damage. His commanding presence inspires nearby allies to attack ruthlessly as well.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tornado_tempest_Des: The Tornado's overpowering winds slow all nearby enemies, flinging debris at them and inflicting damage every second. Enemies closer to the center of the Tornado take more damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tornado_tempest_de: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%. Taking damage per second based on proximity to the Tornado.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tor: CHANNELED - The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a sentient Tornado that he can control. The Tornado slows nearby enemies and does damage. It is invulnerable and can move anywhere.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tou: The Wildwing Ripper's fury numbs it to attacks and inspires nearby allies to withstand more blows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_granite_golem_hp_au: Increases the health capacity of nearby units.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_aura_Desc: Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_aura_bon: Provides %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% lifesteal and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% hp per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_fr: Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing %damage% damage per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_master_f: Unit is rooted and is damaged %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% hp per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_st: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by %armor_reduction_pct%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_trickster_pur: The Satyr Banisher knows every trick in the book, allowing him to remove debuffs from allies or buffs from enemies. His trickery also slows the enemy's movement.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_soulstealer_m: The Satyr Mindstealer removes a fragment of his enemy's soul, burning away some mana and dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_sh: The Satyr Tormenter tears open an unstable rift to the underworld, creating a shockwave that travels in a line along the ground, dealing damage to enemies it hits.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_un: The Satyr Tormenter's demonic communion allows him to emanate regenerative power, increasing the health regeneration of himself and all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_satyr_hellcaller_u: Health regeneration increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: The Hill Troll Priest lays his holy blessing upon the target ally, replenishing some health.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_hurl_boul: Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them. Golems do not do this unless commanded to.
Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?\"
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_rock_dest: On death, Mud Golems shatter into 2 Shard Golems. Shard Golems have %shard_health_tooltip% health, deal %shard_damage_tooltip% damage per attack, and live for %shard_duration_tooltip% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_storm_chain_l: The Harpy Stormcrafter releases a high-voltage bolt of electricity at the target enemy, dealing damage. The bolt jumps to other nearby enemies, losing power with each jump.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_splash: The Black Dragon's explosive attacks are felt by all nearby enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_dragon: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_fireba: The Black Dragon hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a %radius% radius for %duration% seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take %damage% damage per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_so: The Drakken Sentinel has assumed a partially ethereal form, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_ov: The Drakken Armorer moves about quickly, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
The Drakken Armorer is wholly devoted to his cause, increasing his tolerance for physical attacks. Nearby allies are similarly devoted to the Overseer and are able to withstand more blows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide slams his mammoth body against the ground. The shock damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing. Heroes regain their balance more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide works an ally into a frenzy, causing his ally to have increased attack speed.
The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and attack damage of nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, and attack damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Descript:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died.

Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_:
Active: Overwhelm

Stuns a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: %tooltip_range%\n

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
Does not stack with other bashes.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Descrip:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note0: The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note1: The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note2: Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_armlet_unholy:
Damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
Strength increased by 25.
Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Losing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% health per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Descri:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants %aura_attack_speed% attack speed and %aura_positive_armor% armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by %aura_negative_armor%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Note0: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_assault_posit: Armor enhanced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.\nAttack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Descrip:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note0: Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note1: The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_belt_of_streng: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Descript:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward

Destroy a target tree or ward.

Tree Cast Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
Ward Cast Range: %cast_range_ward% \n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %tooltip_quelling_bonus%%% for melee heroes, and %tooltip_quelling_bonus_ranged%%% for ranged. \n

Passive: Cleave

Deals %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target. (Melee Only)
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note2: If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note3: Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black_king_bar: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_black_king_bar_imm: Spell Immune and 100%% resistant to magic damage type.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Des:
Active: Damage Return

For %duration% seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Lor: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Not: Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blades_of_atta: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_of_alacr: A long blade imbued with time magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Descript:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Note1: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_De:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_Lo: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Des:
Active: Bloodpact

Converts %mana_cost_percentage%%% of your current mana to health regeneration over %restore_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Mana Battery

Each charge provides %regen_per_charge% HP and MP regen. Nearby kills provide %kill_charges% charges. Dying causes you to lose %death_charges% charges. Starts with %initial_charges_tooltip% charges.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Lor: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_Descript: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_Note0: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_of_elves: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Descrip:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana over %restore_time% seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero, tower, or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: %tooltip_range%\n

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Note0: Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Note1: If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier's movespeed will be slowed by 30%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bottle_regeneratio: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bracer_Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Descr:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for %tree_duration% seconds.

Range: %range_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_broadsword_Lor: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Descri:
Active: Armor Bonus

Gives +%bonus_aoe_armor% armor to all allied units. Lasts %bonus_aoe_duration_hero% seconds on heroes, %bonus_aoe_duration% seconds on units.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Note: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chainmail_Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Descrip:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refresher_shar:
Use: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Across an epoch of endless battle, the Immortal's will to triumph never faltered.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_circlet_Lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Descri:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero, tower, or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %range_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_faerie_fire_Lo: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infused_raindr:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block %magic_damage_block% magic damage from damage instances over %min_damage% damage.

Comes with %initial_charges% charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Des:
Active: Soul Rend

Silences a target for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional %silence_damage_percent%%% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and %tooltip_crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %target_crit_multiplier%%% damage.

Range: %tooltip_range%\n

Passive: Critical Strike

Grants a %crit_chance%%% chance for attacks to inflict %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Not: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Lor: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodthorn_debuff_: Silenced and taking 30%% increased damage, dealt at the end of the duration of the debuff as magic damage.\nCauses all incoming attacks to crit for 135%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Des:
Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a %movement_slow%%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Lor: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_D:
Passive: Lesser Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_L: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Desc: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tome_of_knowle:
Use: Enlighten

Grants you %xp_bonus% experience plus %xp_per_use% per tome consumed by your team.

Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
That which raises beast to man and man to god.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_tome_of_knowl: Immediately grants 700 experience plus 135 per tome previously consumed by your team.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_D:
Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_L: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy %enemy_length% units away from each other, and for %range_duration% seconds, allows you to make %max_attacks% attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +%bonus_attack_speed% attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: %tooltip_range%
Enemy Range: %cast_range_enemy%\n

Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hurricane_pik: Can attack the target without range restrictions.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_De:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by %cast_range_bonus%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_Lo: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_claymore_Lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Descri:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flying_courier:
Use: Upgrade Courier

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note1: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note2: Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_eul_cyclone_Descri: Swept up in a cyclone, you are invulnerable and unable to act.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Desc:
Active: Cyclone

A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Note: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_5_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_demon_edge_Lor: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Desc:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_desolator_buff_Des: Desolator attacks reduced your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade:
Active: Inhibit

Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Descripti:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible heroes by %movespeed%%% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Note0: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_dustofappeara: Can be seen by enemies when invisible. Slowed by 20%% when invisible.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle_Lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_energy_booster: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for %duration_ally% seconds on allies and %duration% seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.

Range: %tooltip_range%
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ethereal_blad: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Descript:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero, tower, or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %tooltip_range%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_De:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.

Range: %tooltip_range%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_Lo: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_No: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gauntlets_Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Descriptio:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Descript:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Note0: Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_state_Descri: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gloves_Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_D:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_N: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_L: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for %bonus_gold% gold and %xp_multiplier%x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: %transmute_cast_range_tooltip%
Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Note: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Descript:
Passive: Health Regeneration

Restores %health_regen_rate%%% of max health per second.

If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for %cooldown_melee% seconds for melee heroes, or %cooldown_ranged_tooltip% seconds for ranged heroes.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_iron_w: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %tooltip_bounty% gold.

Range: %tooltip_range%\n

Passive: Dominator Aura

Increases nearby allies' attack speed by %attack_speed_aura% and health regen by %hp_regen_aura%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_helm_of_the_d: Increases health regen by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% and attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_of_defian:
Active: Barrier

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hood_of_defia: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hyperstone_Lor: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Des:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain %consumed_bonus% attack speed and %consumed_bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision. Max 1 use.\n

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants %bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Not: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Lor: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_moon_shard_co: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and night vision increased by 200 after consuming a Moon Shard.
Attack speed increased by 60 and night vision increased by 200 after consuming a Moon Shard.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_De:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage on that attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_Lo: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_No: If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_invisibility_: Invisible as the wind. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_De:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage to the target, and for %backstab_duration% seconds, disable their passive abilities.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_Lo: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_No: Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_silver_edge_w: Invisible. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage, slow the target and disable their passives.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimmer_cape_D:
Active: Glimmer

After a %fade_delay% second delay, grants invisibility and %active_magical_armor%%% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for %duration% seconds.

Range: %tooltip_range%

Can be cast while channelling.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimmer_cape_L: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octarine_core_:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%.\n

Passive: Spell Lifesteal

%hero_lifesteal%%% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to %creep_lifesteal%%% against creeps.
At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_enchanted_mang: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Des:
Active: Chop

Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove %creep_damage_pct%%% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: %tooltip_range%
Tree Range: %quelling_range_tooltip%
Ward Range: %cast_range_ward%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Not: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Lor: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus_orb_Lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_lotus_orb_act: Most targeted spells will be re-cast at the caster.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guardian_greav:
>Basic Dispel\n

Passive: Guardian Aura

Provides nearby allies with %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %aura_armor% bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below %aura_bonus_threshold%%%, they receive %aura_health_regen_bonus% health regeneration and %aura_armor_bonus% armor.\nFlat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
The aura boost only applies to heroes.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_guardian_grea: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health per second. Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_De:
Active: Shine

When cast on an ally, grants them %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used.

Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Range: %valor_cast_range_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_Lo: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_solar_crest_a: Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%%%.

Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, movement spead increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Descri:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_De:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_No: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_Lo: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Desc:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Descrip:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.\n

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for %block_cooldown% seconds.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_sphere_target: The next targeted spell will be blocked.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_De:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_Lo: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_No: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Des:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Lor: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Not: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note0: Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note1: Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note2: Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mantle_Lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_of_madnes:
Active: Berserk

Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed%%% movement speed, but reduces your armor by %berserk_armor_reduction% and silences you. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mask_of_madne: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% but reduces armor by 8 and silences you.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Descri:
Active: Restore

Heals %heal_amount% health and gives +%heal_bonus_armor% armor to allied units in a %heal_radius% radius.\n

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allied units in a %aura_radius% radius.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Note0: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Note1: Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mekansm_nohea: Mekansm Restore and Guardian Greaves Mend will not affect a unit that has recently been healed by Restore or Mend.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mithril_hammer: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Descr:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for %static_duration% seconds which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a %static_damage% magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.

Range: %tooltip_range%\n

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note0: Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note1: Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note2: Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mjollnir_stat: When attacked, there is a 20%% chance that lightning will strike attacker and 4 other nearby enemies.
